content:
I got really close, but I think I need to put this down for now and come back to it some other time. I almost got a rust platform to work on Windows with a URL release.

For anyone interested this is where I got to. I'm manually linking here using zig, the app is compiled using roc build --no-link example/main.roc and the host using cargo build --release && mv /target/release/host.lib /platform/windows-x64.lib (this is psuedo commands using *nix stnax, I used the windows equivalents)

I'll clean up the release and publish for macos and linux.
